name: Eidolon (itch) (Circumpunk)
description:
Eidolon - Short FPS project for 7DFPS GameJam

On the Western Burial Barge...

The Cult of Bishops continues it's experiments to bind the wraiths of fallen warriors to the material plane...

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look
  • LMB - Fire
  • RMB - Sights Aim
  • Q - Equip Weapon
  • R - Reload
  • E - Action
  • Space - Jump (Up to 2 times)
  • Jump along walls to wall run & jump between walls to gain height.
  • Scroll Wheel Button/Left Shift - Go incorporeal (HOLD) Lasts 5 seconds
  • 0 Button - Toggle experimental full incorporeal

Hello everyone and many many thanks for checking out my project for the 7DFPS gamejam.

The player can turn incorporeal to pass through certain objects and avoid incoming damage. I wanted the player to be fully incorporeal when using the ghosting mode so they can pass through all objects and glide like a ghost would, but I kept running into problems. So I included it as a toggle but be warned it can cause some unexpected results at times.

Bugs I am aware of:

  • Unfortunately as hard as I tried I just could not get my WebGL build to work.
  • The player's weapon gets randomly unequipped once in a while. Not sure why it keeps happening but just press Q to re-equip your weapon.
  • The ghost mode makes the Melee bosses animations freeze up.  Annoying but it was a bug I just didn't have time to fix
